chunks.text:
Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:05:43
Folder: C12IAQM - we’re here for you support during challenging times
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C12IAQM_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-08 14:21
Subject: We’re here for you | Support during challenging times
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/547958/EF0F59DF0A5E939F56F8BDEA500BA73E/wellbeing-week-2023-12.gif> 	
As the tragic events continue to unfold in our region, we want to take a moment to remind you that we are here for you and are committed to supporting you as we navigate these trying times together.

Please find below some resources, services, and initiatives that we have in place to help you look after your mental health and wellbeing and remember that it’s okay to seek help when you need. 

We are all in this together, and we are committed to creating a supportive environment for everyone.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550461/9DC7D8F15555A7FB56ABEEE6BBF28262/screen-shot-2024-10-07-at-8-07-25-pm.png> 	

Counselling and Therapy Services


Our professional mental health support services are available to all our team members across offices, stores, and warehouses in every country.

metadata.doc_id: C12IAQM - we’re here for you support during challenging times\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C12IAQM - we’re here for you support during challenging times\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Our professional mental health support services are available to all our team members across offices, stores, and warehouses in every country. These services are offered for free and with complete confidentiality, providing you with a safe space to share your thoughts and feelings.

Through our Employee Assistance Programme <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f54632%252fmental-health-support-is-now-available-in-all-countries%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeBdhQtXReA8WvMlnnsQPzxzoAuWJe9Nr5bSCsXyUYTYfqnYJC6%252bc1%252bHwvzwKOG%252fectzNE%252fcjYzV4yVwtCrMKOBD1%252bW4qmu4EWikndQmKocQYUxIG94Me4PMwwCQ4rk69hCtuiZNJRyzJxrFf4RxfvS7LuVM%252fWLyp2KqM%252fXeprcZKm7ocRqiMpZYFwbjEMkZZu95YrcdSwEj12aRXzbbREGL8caQmN%252bIxsXQRIowLcze&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cf94d29338aef4c4130eb08dce782ece3%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638639796729503876%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=HFzqHcye1A7hexF5zhoBh3%2BimNVZ57jFsUlxxdlqqc8%3D&reserved=0>  (EAP), we remain dedicated to fostering a culture of diversity, equity, and inclusion, ensuring everyone has equal opportunities to access the support and resources needed to prioritize their mental health and wellbeing.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550470/96FF802D1795B8B31775B3867A7D0D5E/banner-2-1.png>

chunks.text:
<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550470/96FF802D1795B8B31775B3867A7D0D5E/banner-2-1.png> 	

Community Support Online Sessions


Over the past two weeks, we hosted online support sessions for those impacted by Lebanon’s crisis.

Join us this Thursday, October 10th at 2pm (UAE time) for an additional session that will address collective grief, self-care during crisis, how to support others, and the resources available for you, in a space where you share your emotions and connect with others going through the same experience.

Calendar invite will be sent soon by Internal Communications.

You can also revisit the previous session here. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fmod%252fvideo%252fview.php%253fid%253d13785%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeBdhQtXReA8WvMlnnsQPzxzoAuWJe9Nr5bSCsXyUYTYfqnYJC6%252bc1%252bHwvzwKOG%252fectzNE%252fcjYzV4yVwtCrMKOBD1%252bW4qmu4EWikndQmKocQYUxIG94Me4PMwwCQ4rk69hCtuiZNJRyzJxrFf4RxfvS7LuVM%252fWLyp2KqM%252fXeprcZKm7ocRqiMpZYFwbjEMkZZu95YrcdSwEj12aRXzbbREGL8caQmN%252bIxsXQRIowLcze&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cf94d29338aef4c4130eb08dce782ece3%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638639796729532716%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=v%2FKJEqdMaCwrr12wM0JIyH4qV6R0xlKBpNnGGMFpteE%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550462/21E02CF4E6E80FECB27455C3240F34CB/dsc03385.jpg> 	
Wellbeing Resources

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550462/21E02CF4E6E80FECB27455C3240F34CB/dsc03385.jpg> 	
Wellbeing Resources 

Practicing self-compassion, learning how to care for yourself and others, and how to better manage stress, trauma and anxiety can help you navigate unsettling times. Take the time to explore the resources available for you on the Wellbeing Academy under Chalhoub University here. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d2729%2526stoploop%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeBdhQtXReA8WvMlnnsQPzxzoAuWJe9Nr5bSCsXyUYTYfqnYJC6%252bc1%252bHwvzwKOG%252fectzNE%252fcjYzV4yVwtCrMKOBD1%252bW4qmu4EWikndQmKocQYUxIG94Me4PMwwCQ4rk69hCtuiZNJRyzJxrFf4RxfvS7LuVM%252fWLyp2KqM%252fXeprcZKm7ocRqiMpZYFwbjEMkZZu95YrcdSwEj12aRXzbbREGL8caQmN%252bIxsXQRIowLcze&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cf94d29338aef4c4130eb08dce782ece3%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638639796729549416%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=RBzDa4zmnk2kb1IeJrhKCq6EAgrz%2BU6MsB6bJbCoygA%3D&reserved=0> 

Mental Health Matters Course

Look after yourself, gain insights into mental health issues, learn to recognise signs of distress, and understand how to support yourself and others, with our new Mental Health Learning Course, designed to equip you with valuable skills and knowledge to support you, your colleagues and team members.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550466/E7E994BEB3C8039F7B12EAA814DB1A7C/screen-shot-2024-10-07-at-9-30-59-pm.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550465/C126910D7557F5F89C169A9510A1F32C/shkh-3157-1.jpg> 	
Mental Health Guides

To further assist you, we provide tailored online guides focused on mental health and wellbeing:

- For All Team Members: How to Cope with Painful Emotions and Support Your Colleagues.

HR Support

In moments of need, please don’t hesitate to reach out to your manager, People Partner, or HR Operations. You can also contact our HR hotline in your country for additional assistance. We are here to support you every step of the way.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/CDu4AbRzW0qL4f6Uwwxo8g/550469/64D4A0F8E577108A71EC05D33FBF6D22/chalhoub-grad-72.jpg> 	
Thank you for being a part of our community. Our collective strength lies in supporting one another.

EXPLORE ALL RESOURCES HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f52880%252fwellbeing-support-and-resources-for-our-team-members%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeBdhQtXReA8WvMlnnsQPzxzoAuWJe9Nr5bSCsXyUYTYfqnYJC6%252bc1%252bHwvzwKOG%252fectzNE%252fcjYzV4yVwtCrMKOBD1%252bW4qmu4EWikndQmKocQYUxIG94Me4PMwwCQ4rk69hCtuiZNJRyzJxrFf4RxfvS7LuVM%252fWLyp2KqM%252fXeprcZKm7ocRqiMpZYFwbjEMkZZu95YrcdSwEj12aRXzbbREGL8caQmN%252bIxsXQRIowLcze&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cf94d29338aef4c4130eb08dce782ece3%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638639796729601233%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FtxbgiRDJjXUzExIcysUEKVioWmNVKPmk8k47JN5Rvc%3D&reserved=0>
